comments:
3.2 RC2

I was following the "Creating a Rich Client Application" PDE cheat sheet, and at some point (I believe in the 2nd or 3rd task), I got the following error in my log. I did not see any problems in the UI.

The error seems to happen when I click on "Launch the Product" or "Synchronize" in the Testing section of the product file editor.
this one is a must-fix for RC3

Created an attachment (id=40102)
simple and safe patch to address this issue

Good patch.  Risk is virtually non-existent, very high value.

+1 for RC3.

Dejan, we need one more approval.
